name: Bella Bellini Herbal Tea
description: Sip, smile, repeat! Experience caffeine-free bliss and sugar-free sweetness. It’s delish brewed hot or cold. Remember fuzzy peach candies? This is the drinkable version, rockin’ an irresistible Bellini vibe. The stunning ruby hue comes from antioxidant-rich hibiscus, keeping it real with no fake colours or flavours.
preparation: For a hot brew, pour boiling water over tea bag. Steep 5–7 min.

For a cold brew, place tea bag in a large cup or container with a resealable lid (like a Mason jar). Pour cold water over top. Cover and refrigerate 6 hr or overnight. Squeeze bag to release flavour, then discard.
tips: Make a big batch! Fill a pitcher with cold water. For every 1 cup of water, add 1–2 tea bags. Refrigerate at least 6 hr or overnight. Remove tea bags and enjoy!
